messages.help:
Here's how the buttons below work

â€¢ latest sermon - Stream or download the most recent sermon
â€¢ get sermon - Get a specific sermon by title
â€¢ devotional - Get today's devotional

Other commands
â€¢ /mute - Mute notifications
â€¢ /unmute - Unmute notifications
messages.bc_help:
How to use broadcast types

â€¢ text - Send written text broadcast to all users
â€¢ photo - Send a photo with/without caption as broadcast.
â€¢ video - Send a video clip (must be less than 50mb) as broadcast with/without caption
â€¢ animation - Send short animated gif as broadcast with/without caption.

Use /cancel to cancel operation.
